title: Best of The Herd for Jan 17, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jan 17, 2020
description:
Colin wants Aaron Rodgers to stop playing it safe and take some risks otherwise the Packers have no shot against the 49ers. He isn't bothered by Andy Reid not winning a Super Bowl yet because he has almost always had the inferior QB until now. He makes his AFC and NFC Conference Championship picks. Plus, Titans CB Logan Ryan comes on to talk about how the team feeds of the fact that everyone keeps telling them they'll lose and why facing Patrick Mahomes is difficult.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
